verses.verse: A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%>. <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5324>standeth<s%> in the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> of the <S%H410>mighty<s%>; he <S%H8199>judgeth<s%> <S%H7130>among<s%> the <S%H430>gods<s%>. of Asaph: or, for Asaph
How long will ye <S%H8199>judge<s%> <S%H5766>unjustly<s%>, and <S%H5375>accept<s%> the <S%H6440>persons<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>? <S%H5542>Selah<s%>.
<S%H8199>Defend<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>: do <S%H6663>justice<s%> to the <S%H6041>afflicted<s%> and <S%H7326>needy<s%>. Defend: Heb. Judge
<S%H6403>Deliver<s%> the <S%H1800>poor<s%> and <S%H34>needy<s%>: <S%H5337>rid<s%> them out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7563>wicked<s%>.

They <S%H3045>know<s%> not, neither will they <S%H995>understand<s%>; they <S%H1980>walk<s%> on in <S%H2825>darkness<s%>: all the <S%H4144>foundations<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> are out of <S%H4131>course<s%>. out: Heb. moved
I have <S%H559>said<s%>, Ye are <S%H430>gods<s%>; and all of you are <S%H1121>children<s%> of the most <S%H5945>High<s%>.
<S%H403>But<s%> ye shall <S%H4191>die<s%> like <S%H120>men<s%>, and <S%H5307>fall<s%> like <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H8269>princes<s%>.
<S%H6965>Arise<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>, <S%H8199>judge<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>: for thou shalt <S%H5157>inherit<s%> all <S%H1471>nations<s%>.
